e="preserve">Diana Sowle (June 19, 1930 – October 19, 2018) was an American actress. She was born in California. Sowle was known for her roles as Mrs. Hellen Bucket in the 1971 hit movie "Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory" and as a variety of characters in the video game "Fallout 3". Her only other screen roles were in 1994, when she appeared in "Clear and Present Danger" and "Guarding Tess".
Sowle died on October 19, 2018 at the age of 88.
